src:
Gosti se gostili u Evrokupu
05 Nov 2019, 22:50 by Darko
U prvih pet utakmica 6. kola Evrokupa koje su odigrane u utorak, samo je jedna pripala domaćoj ekipi.
Andora je pred svojim navijačima savladala Monako, na čijoj klupi je Saša Obradović. Španski tim ne samo da je pobedio „kneževe“, nego je ostvario i ubedljiviji trijumf od 16 poena razlike koliko je Monako slavio u prvom susretu ova dva tima.
U grupi D, kao i u grupi B, obe pobede su pripale gostima. Trento je u Istanbulu nadoknadio 14 poena minusa iz prvog poluvremena i pobedio Galatasaraj, a Oldenburg je u poslednjoj četvrtini postigao 26, a primio samo šest poena za trijumf protiv Gdinje.
Grupa A:Andora – Monako 95:68
Grupa B:Lokomotiva – Ritas 82:87Partizan – Venecija 69:83
Grupa D:Galatasaraj – Trento 76:81Gdinja – Oldenburg 61:73

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Guests were hosted at Eurocup
05 Nov 2019, 21:50 by Darko
In the first five games of the 6th round of the Eurocup that were played on Tuesday, only one belonged to the home team.
Andorra defeated Monaco in front of its fans, whose bench is Sasa Obradovic. The Spanish team not only beat the "princes" but also achieved a more convincing triumph than the 16 points difference Monaco celebrated in the first match between the two teams.
In Group D, as in Group B, both wins went to the guests. Trento made up 14 points in the first half in Istanbul to beat Galatasaray, with Oldenburg scoring 26 in the last quarter, receiving just six points for the triumph against Gdynia.
Group A: Andorra - Monaco 95:68
Group B: Lokomotiv - Ritas 82: 87Partizan - Venice 69:83
Group D: Galatasaray - Trento 76: 81Gdynia - Oldenburg 61:73
